guia.usos: >scope< >@<|mention a user, >scope< >num_page<|the rank page
guia.funcao: The member's level ranking on the server, active members have more experience and therefore are more prominent in the ranking; sometimes the rating can grant up to 5x XP for each message
Confirm whether a user is cattle or not

guia.usos: >@< >@<|mention two people, >ID< >ID<|use two user id
guia.funcao: Shows the level of affinity between two people

guia.usos: |Praised be!
guia.funcao: Send a greeting to baidu in the chat

guia.usos: eight and seven|makes alonsal say "eight-seven" with TTS in the chat, >FILE<|re-sends the file sent by the user
guia.funcao: Alonsal will speak in TTS or send files with this command

guia.usos: |tell a random curiosity
guia.funcao: Alonsal will tell a random curiosity (only in Portuguese)

guia.usos: |tell a random joke
guia.funcao: Alonsal will tell a random joke (only in Portuguese)

guia.usos: >your_text<|YoUr tExT WiLl lOoK LiKe tHiS
guia.funcao: It will make your text stylish

guia.usos: |show your ping
guia.funcao: See your ping and Alonsal's ping

guia.usos: >your_text<|code your text in morse, >your_morse<|decode your text from morse, rev >your_text<|(De)codes your text/morse and even reverses the character order
guia.funcao: Encode and decode whatever you want to/from Morse

guia.usos: >your_text<|encodes your text to binary, >your_binary<|decode your text from binary, rev >your_text<|(De)codes your text/binary and even reverses the character order
guia.funcao: Encodes and decodes what you input to/from the binary

guia.usos: >your_text<|inverts your text
guia.funcao: Inverts and uninverts the entered text

guia.usos: >key< >your_text<|encrypt your text with the entered key, >key< >encrypted_text<|decrypts the text with the given key
guia.funcao: Encrypt and decrypt the text entered with a key

guia.usos: >your_search<|Search for something on wikipedia
guia.funcao: Search what is informed on wikipedia, the language of wikipedia and its content is defined based on the language of Alonsal.

guia.usos: >some_location<|Shows the current time in some searched location, los angeles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, l#o5s an0g%$eles|Shows the weather in Los Angeles, "Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha!"|Show the weather in Saint-Louis-du-Ha! Ha! without disregarding the entered characters
guia.funcao: Show current time and lots of other information somewhere, search using "quotes" to not skip any characters

guia.usos: |show any event today, 01-21|show some random event on January 21st
guia.funcao: Displays events by history on the date informed, can show the current day and any other date, creating lists with all in one day or not (only in Portuguese)

guia.usos: >your_emoji<|increase the emoji sent
guia.funcao: Increases the emoji entered (only works with custom emojis from the server)

guia.usos: |show your avatar, >@<|show the avatar of the mentioned user, >ID<|show avatar based on user id
guia.funcao: Show your or a user's avatar

guia.usos: |show server icon
guia.funcao: Shows the icon of the server where you used the command, you can save the image

guia.usos: diamond|minecraft inventory diamond research, saddle|minecraft inventory saddle research
guia.funcao: Search and display information about a minecraft item, in all there are more than 1300 items available for research

guia.usos: |shows information of the server where the command is executed
guia.funcao: Displays server information, for example, creation date, owner, moderation level, number of members, voice channels, audio channels, categories and etc.

guia.usos: |shows information about you, >@<|shows information about mentioned member, >ID<|shows information about member mentioned with ID
guia.funcao: Displays information about you or a searched user, for example, account creation date, when you joined the server and ID

guia.usos: |shows information of the channel where the command is executed, >#<|shows information of the mentioned channel, >ID<|shows information of the channel with the given ID
guia.funcao: Mostra informações do canal informado, tais como data de criação, se é NSFW, se é um canal de áudio, o servidor, seu ID e etc

guia.usos: |play jokenpo without a defined choice, paper|play jokenpo with chosen role
guia.funcao: Play jokenpo automatically or set, playing without informing rock paper or scissors will make your choice random

guia.usos: heads|play with heads option, tails|play with tails option
guia.funcao: To play heads or tails, it is necessary to inform one of the two options to be able to play, this command changes your entries if Alonsal is in another language

guia.usos: |rolls 1 6-sided dice, 5 6|rolls 5 6-sided dice, 10 50|rolls 10 50-sided dice
guia.funcao: Rolls 1 or multiple dice with multiple faces, the minimum value of faces is 4 and the maximum is 10,000, and the maximum dice limit is 50

guia.usos: |returns a link to Pula Prédios!
guia.funcao: The javascript game set up by Slondo, waxed to the max as it should be

guia.usos: >@<|set a channel to receive free game ads, rem|turn off game ad for the channel
guia.funcao: Notifies the informed role whenever free games are available for a limited time

guia.usos: |alonsal information
guia.funcao: Returns information about Alonsal

guia.usos: |alonsal's website
guia.funcao: Returns the link to this site!

guia.usos: >your_text<|sends a text to Alonsal
guia.funcao: Send messages and suggestions to Alonsal with the command <mr>.amail</mr>

guia.usos: |invitation to add Alonsal to a server
guia.funcao: Invite alonsal to a server!

guia.usos: |invitation to the Alonsal server
guia.funcao: Join the Alonsal server

guia.usos: |links to help Alonsal
guia.funcao: Ajude a desenvolver e manter o Alonsal, toda ajuda é bem vinda

guia.usos: br|sets Alonsal's language to Portuguese, n|sets Alonsal's language to English
guia.funcao: Changes the Alonsal language on the server, all Alonsal commands and returns are based on the defined server language, even direct message messages

guia.usos: 🕺 dancing|adds a custom emoji with the name "dancing", >image_file< dancing|added a custom emoji in file, >emoji_link< dancing|added a custom emoji based on the submitted link
guia.funcao: Adds a new emoji to the server with the given name, the input can be an emoji (if you have nitro discord), a file smaller than 256kb or an emoji link copied from another server

guia.usos: 😢|remove the given emoji, >emoji_id<|remove the emoji with the given id
guia.funcao: Remove the emoji from the server

guia.usos: 50|remove the last 50 chat messages
guia.funcao: Delete chat messages, messages sent 2 weeks ago or more are not deleted due to Discord limitations

guia.usos: >@<|ban the mentioned member, >ID<|ban the member with the given ID
guia.funcao: Ban a member from the server

guia.usos: >@<|kicks the mentioned member, >ID<|kicks the member with the given ID
guia.funcao: Kicks a member from the server

guia.usos: !|change Alonsal prefix to <mr>!</mr>, +|change Alonsal prefix to <mr>+</mr>
guia.funcao: Changes the Alonsal prefix on the entire server, all returns from commands that have prefixes included are also updated, the menu and the entire Alonsal

guia.usos: slondotk|shows slondo's profile on Steam
guia.funcao:
Displays various information from a searched profile, information such as games owned, achievements achieved, games 100% completed, badges, level, screenshots and etc.
To search your profile, create a custom link to your Steam profile and use it when searching with .asus

guia.usos: s t k|choose between <mr>s</mr> <mr>t</mr> and <mr>k</mr>, [2 stk|choose 2 options of <mr>s</mr> <mr>t</mr> and <mr>k</mr>
guia.funcao: Choose 1 or several options provided

guia.usos: slomdo|returns 3 anagrams formed with the input "slomdo"
guia.funcao: Creates anagrams with the given input, also displays the number of possible combinations and 3 other randomly generated combinations

guia.usos: 1 + 1|returns the value of 1 + 1, +5 1 2 3 4 5|returns all entered numbers plus 5, *3.14 1 2 3 4 5|returns all entered numbers multiplied by 3.14, 5!|returns the value of 5 factorial, 5! + 8!|adds 5 factorial and 8 factorial and returns <mr>40.440</mr>, + 1 2 3 4 5|returns the sum of all numbers entered, * 1 2 3 4 5|returns multiplication of all numbers
guia.funcao: Returns the result of the operations entered, all basic operators (+, -, /, *) are accepted, numbers with comma can be used normally

guia.usos: o slomdo|removes all o's from the word/phrase
guia.funcao: Remove or replace all characters from the given word/phrase, to replace, use as <mr>.arp hi slomdo</mr>, all <mr>o's</mr> will be replaced by <mr> i's</mr>

guia.usos: |change permissions so @everyone can no longer speak on the channel
guia.funcao: Locks and unlocks the channel, to unlock the channel use <mr>.aunlk</mr> and the settings will be reset to the previous default

guia.usos: |display the list of commands sorting by activations, >num_page<|the rank page
guia.funcao: The command rank displays the list of commands activated throughout Alonsal's history, highlighting the most popular commands to the least popular ones

guia.usos: |create a random password with several characters, >password_length<|create the password with the given length, 10|create a password with 10 characters
guia.funcao: Generates several random passwords for you to use on your accounts, we still recommend using two-factor authentication apps

guia.usos: stone|starts super jokenpo with rock, rock paper scissors|plays 3x with 3 different items, dragon snake wolf wolf|plays 4x with 4 items
guia.funcao: Super Jokenpo contains 15 choices, play only once or up to 10 times at once informing multiple items, you can choose between (rock, paper, scissors, fire, snake, human, tree, wolf, sponge, air, water, dragon , devil, lightning and gun)
